title: Panic in fs walk

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

labels.name: skip-changelog
labels.description: Bugs that have never been in a released stable version, and as such excluded from the release notes

body:
in the test suite:

```
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x20 pc=0x46ce6fa]

goroutine 104 [running]:
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/scanner.(*walker).createFSWalkFn.func1(0xc4208000e0, 0x14, 0x0, 0x0, 0x49bac80, 0xc4201380c0, 0xc4201380c0, 0x0)
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/scanner/walk.go:268 +0x2aa
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/fs.(*walkFilesystem).walk(0xc420c7d130, 0x4909355, 0x1, 0x49c3a20, 0xc42062a070, 0xc4200aabc0, 0x0, 0xfa631301)
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/fs/walkfs.go:66 +0x3cb
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/fs.(*walkFilesystem).Walk(0xc420c7d130, 0x4909355, 0x1, 0xc4200aabc0, 0xc4200aabe0, 0xc4200aabd8)
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/fs/walkfs.go:92 +0x10e
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/scanner.(*walker).fsWalkerRoutine(0xc420676000, 0x49c0c80, 0xc42001ed40, 0xc42008ec60, 0xc4207ea090)
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/scanner/walk.go:233 +0x106
created by github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/scanner.(*walker).walk
	/Users/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/scanner/walk.go:122 +0x340
FAIL	github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model	0.134s
```

Happened once and then not again, but looking at the walkFn it's clear our error handling is broken. #4584 removed the early error handing in the walk function.

Of course this becomes clear literally minutes after releasing the RC.
